lender.name: anni
lender.loan_because: i can.

lender.name: Michel
lender.loan_because: Because I care...

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: Investing like this will build a saner, better world for my son.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs to help people write computer programs.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to make the best decisions for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work to discover new drugs that treat dangerous diseases.

lender.name: Olivier
lender.loan_because: It is easy and it feels right.

lender.name: Gonçalo
lender.whereabouts: Rio de Mouro Rio de Mouro
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to do it and help the Universe balance itself - it also feels good! :)

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I really like the idea of lending to real people who are trying to better themselves and their families. I love the idea of micro-loans.

lender.name: Iskra
lender.loan_because: Right now I'm able to, and I hope it will help someone in need.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: sometimes just a little bit of help at the right time can make all the difference in the world!
lender.occupational_info: I help students at the university in chosing the right classes, deciding what to major in, and I also help them solve problems with school or "life".

lender.name: Scott Woods
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur myself, I understand how important these loans can be to someone's success. I also know that it can be much more difficult to raise money in other parts of the world. It's great to be able to help other people make a better life for themselves, and it's even better when you have something in common with the people that you're helping.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small business that creates custom computer software for other businesses and universities.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: i am a creative capitalist
lender.occupational_info: i am sociologist in training

lender.name: Barbara & Thom
lender.loan_because: We like to feel that we can make a difference in our world family. God blesses you with many gifts! Kiva connects us and lifts us up.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy providing information and entertainment resources to the people in my community. Thom fixes up houses and then rents them.

lender.name: Denis
lender.loan_because: Advantages of this system are so obvious. There is no need to comment.

lender.name: Kamon
lender.loan_because: Sharing is Caring

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: It matters!!
lender.occupational_info: Help others

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: poverty is a human creation.

lender.name: St Johns Episcopal
lender.loan_because: We simply want to share our good fortune with others.
lender.occupational_info: We are an inclusive, progressive Episcopal Church in Huntingdon Valley, Pennsylvania

lender.name: Stef
lender.loan_because: I hope it will help the loan recipients.
lender.occupational_info: I write and edit books that help people use computers effectively.

lender.name: sandra
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and want to support others who are trying to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I was an elementary school teacher for 34 years. Now I travel and help with the family business. I also volunteer at a homeless shelter.

lender.name: Alejandra
lender.loan_because: I should

lender.name: Kovachy family
lender.loan_because: People who are working hard to make a living and support their families deserve help.
lender.occupational_info: We help people achieve their personal goals and heal from pain through counseling and psychotherapy.

lender.name: Ronda
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Most people think of Librarians as people who lend books. We are so much more. We are the keepers of information. We enrich people's lives with knowledge. Our goal is to open your world to larger possiblities than you ever dreamed. Information, knowledge and wisdom give power to those who seek. Many times the power is in finding a way to be at peace or spread peace. It is good to share these things, I love being a Librarian.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: I help companies implement a specific software package that enables them to analyze large amounts of data quickly and easily and make business decisions based upon the analysis.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Steen Kraemer
lender.loan_because: Economic activity is the safest way for third world economies to grow and create wealth.

lender.name: Louis
lender.loan_because: This person has a good reason for asking: to teach his kids about business.
lender.occupational_info: I work hard to get good grades at school.

lender.name: Sunil
lender.loan_because: Want to make a difference

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: I can comfortably share, so I do.

lender.name: Mark & Theresie
lender.loan_because: I can and because my Christian faith dictates that I do what I can to help others and this is certainly a way to do that.

lender.name: Taryn
lender.loan_because: it's how it should be...
lender.occupational_info: I help scientists find the differences and similarities between people of the world through genomics research.

lender.name: Lilamani
lender.loan_because: I lend in honour of my parents, who have been leaders in making the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work for companies that are discovering and developing new medicines.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to share
lender.occupational_info: Helping people to know about the love of Jesus

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: The return on my happiness far exceeds that available in the money market.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: Selfishly speaking, somewhere someone has an idea that could have a genuine impact on my life. If they don't have the funds to follow through, that impact won't occur. If they do, the door opens to possibility.
lender.occupational_info: I help to manipulate minds to consider purchasing items that they might otherwise not need, want or use.

lender.name: Zeeshan Ali
lender.loan_because: To Keep Our School Running
lender.occupational_info: More than 100 Students are studying on Freeship Basis. They belong to extremely poor and needy families. Most of them are orphans.

lender.name: dMb
lender.loan_because: others helped me when I was struggling to start my practice 5 years ago. Now I want to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: Eclectic approach to body/energy work combining Eastern and Western modalities into each healing session.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I have a good life, I want to help others live a good life as well.
lender.occupational_info: Scientific instrumentation

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good.

lender.name: Magnus Callmyr
lender.loan_because: I believe it could make a difference for someone. And the world needs more caring.
lender.occupational_info: I study to become a counselor for those, like I have been before, who are trapped in drug addiction.

lender.name: samson
lender.loan_because: i want to buy some mountain equipments and to start bulding my own website so that people can see what am doing
lender.occupational_info: am a mountain guide who need to start organizing myself for people to climb and to make sure that people get the right salary and providing the right mountain equipments

lender.name: Ricky Buchanan
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to live in Australia where I am supported by the government to live with my disabilities, and I have enough to share a little.
lender.occupational_info: I do volunteer work via the phone and the internet, mostly to help other people with disabilities. I also write and do various creative stuff. I run the website http://atmac.org/ about assistive tech for Mac OS X users with disabilities, and http://bedbound.org/ for bedridden and housebound people.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: I can, and that's a powerful force for change in the world.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: it allows one individual to empower another.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a new mother and stay home to take care of my son, but before this I managed projects for a large internet technology company in Silicon Valley.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: My money is better used changing lives than sitting in a bank account.
lender.occupational_info: I help manage an organization so that high school students from poor families can succeed.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: the energy of life expresses itself through circulation. The success of one I touch becomes my own and thus we both are blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an international consumer electronics company and it is my job to manage a team of reps who train resellers how to sell our products.

lender.name: paul
lender.loan_because: for many reasons
lender.occupational_info: normal

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Homeopath - helping people enjoy better health through homeopathy.

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: I like to make a little difference. It amazes and humbles me to know that my Kiva contributions -- pocket change to me in my privileged world -- can truly change the lives of fellow humans in less privileged places.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Canada's central bank

lender.name: edward & Donna
lender.loan_because: Even in a small way we can make a difference. We are so blessed to live in the US and hope to extend our blessing around the world
lender.occupational_info: Manufacturing and energy performance consultants

lender.name: Durham Friends Meeting
lender.loan_because: Free charity? hello?

lender.name: Martin
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional Credit Manager, making certain that clients pay the company I work for in time, and reducing the risks for the company when dealing with clients, existing and new ones, in an everchanging world.

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.occupational_info: Lots of fun

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: A great way to directly to affect someones life.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because:
I want them to be successful and do what I can to help.
Luke 12:48
lender.occupational_info: I buy land and sell it to people to build their business or house on it.

lender.name: Cooper
lender.loan_because: I want people to have successful businesses
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in the 3rd grade

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: it demonstrates the love of Christ who said to care for the widows and the orphans.
lender.occupational_info: I help teach 10-11 year old students how to think logically, scientifically, and relationally; it is my desire to send them forward loving science.

lender.name: John and Linda
lender.loan_because: We recognize how blessed we are and how important even small amounts of credit can be in establishing a worthy new business.

lender.name: Brian & Lisa
lender.loan_because: We believe in hard work and a desire to succeed in life.
lender.occupational_info: We develop web sites and create logos and brochures for small businesses.

lender.name: Patti, MIke & Alex
lender.loan_because: We feel we should help people that are working hard to help themselves.

lender.name: NTodd
lender.loan_because: I am a war tax resister and want to take money that would have gone to bombs and give it to people who are building a future.
lender.occupational_info: I teach to college students, corporations and the Federal government how the Internet and other telecommunications technologies work and can solve problems.

lender.name: Olivia and Debra
lender.loan_because:
Olivia loans to help people build their business.
Debra loans because she understands the value of the independence and the dignity which comes from making something to contribute to the world.
lender.occupational_info: Olivia is an eight and a half year old third grade student Debra is a mom to five kids: an 18 year-old college-bound daughter; a 21 year-old step-daughter attending univerity in Illinois; a 24 year-old step son living in Las Vegas; a ten-year-old daughter in fifth grade; and Olivia, who thought it would be fun and exciting to join Mom in this venture!

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping someone provide for themselves is the best kind of help.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses protect themselves from loss

lender.name: Pat & Doug
lender.loan_because: We want to reduce poverty worldwide
lender.occupational_info: As a physical therapist Pat works with children with developmental disabilities to help them be more independent in school. As an engineer, Doug works for a company that builds equipment for cellular (mobile) telephones.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: My Grandpa wants me to learn how to give to others.
lender.occupational_info: Eating, sleeping, and food processing.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I am the beneficiary of many blessings and hope to multiply them in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with their personal finances.

lender.name: Tom and Liliana
lender.loan_because: We get great satisfaction knowing we're helping someone, so helping people through KIVA is really a gift to ourselves.

lender.name: Regan
lender.loan_because: I try to live my life by the words of Gandhi, "Be the change you wish to see in the world." I know that I can make a difference in these people's lives, so why would I ignore that opportunity to do some good in the world?
lender.occupational_info: I attend University in the UK even though I was born in America. I have a degree in Philosophy and am currently studying for my Masters in South Asian religions. I hope to become a lawyer who works with charities and nonprofit organizations.

lender.name: charleene
lender.loan_because: i believe this is a very helpful and effective way to help those who are in need that have the drive and motivation to reach their goals in life. it's very personal to be able to see photos and read about the different types of businesses and family lives others have in different parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: i am a salesperson working for a hotel getting people to come to our hotel and fill our meeting space and guest rooms by selling them on all of the benefits of staying at our hotel versus another hotel

lender.name: Samir
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I do research to help find better/safer ways to get medicines into the the right place in the body and in the end provide more effective therapy.

lender.name: Quakers
lender.loan_because: Quaker Meetings that wish to try Kiva
lender.occupational_info: We represent seven Quaker congregations with small funds to loan.

lender.name: Jamee
lender.loan_because: Giving is a natural state of being. We are here to help eachother.
lender.occupational_info: I produce videos about people's lives and businesses helping them to get exposure and record memories.

lender.name: Sandro
lender.loan_because: Fish is not enough, we should teach fishing
lender.occupational_info: Creative, but part of the big capitalistic "game"

lender.name: Allan
lender.loan_because: What goes around comes around.
lender.occupational_info: It's a job, it pays the bills.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: microfinance might just work.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I help home buyers find places to live in large cities in the United States.

lender.name: Wendelin
lender.loan_because: It makes sense to help people in order to enable them to help themselves.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: Its a great way to give people that hand up - i strongly belive that give someone the means they will make it
lender.occupational_info: I work in a college with young adults who have problems with maths and reading

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: The world's economic inequalities, and the end of inequality, are based in fundamental human traits.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy hiking, running, being in the forest near the ocean, being in the desert and the mountains, swimming, motorcycles & archery.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I want to help others have as good a life as I do
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom....... it probably isn't much different really than anywhere else in the world.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.occupational_info: I work with fish

lender.name: Anar Davis
lender.loan_because: I want to share chances life has given me.

lender.name: Mimi
lender.loan_because: I want to learn about other parts of the world, and to help people that don't have as much as I do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in Kindergarten, which is fun because I get to learn something new everyday.

lender.name: Louisa
lender.loan_because: I have more than enough.
lender.occupational_info: I look after the house, my kids and my husband! I love volunteering in my community, at my kids' schools and at my church.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I want to help ambitious and hardworking people who find it hard to obtain credit in their home countries.
lender.occupational_info: Law student

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: It's a great investment opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Doing what I can to make the world a little better.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: The small amounts that I can afford when teamed up with others, equal opportunities for hard working people to prosper.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that manages data from clinical drug trials. Many of these drug trials are for cancer treatments. I write software to help collect and report on this data.

lender.name: Sheil
lender.loan_because: I can. Plain and simple.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed to be born in a country of abundance and believe I have an obligation to share that blessing as best I can.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the financial accounting and reporting of a business.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: Folks need help all over the world
lender.occupational_info: Test coatings in lab

lender.name: KATHRYN
lender.loan_because: The money that I'm giving is empowering people who have goals.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: I have everything that I could ever need, and I want to give to people who don't.
lender.occupational_info: I go to high school. I guess that's work...

lender.name: St. Mark
lender.loan_because: We want help people to work for positive change in areas of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of members of St Mark's Episcopal Church in St. Louis Missouri who want to learn more about the Millenium Development Goals.

lender.name: Ihsan
lender.loan_because: I have one Internet Cafe and I want aprove my Net Cafe there fore I need money for my career if you help me in this case I never forget your kindness.
lender.occupational_info: I want make my Net Cafe one of the most famous in the world. And this is my wish in my live that is all.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: management

lender.name: Jantarp
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed by God, so we want to bless others in need. We believe in paying it forward. It's not what you've got, but what you give that's important.
lender.occupational_info: Provide reasonably priced rental properties to both help our tenants and provide for the future needs of our family

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I visited Bolivia last year and the Bolivian people deserve economic opportunities which KIVA can provide

lender.name: Anup
lender.loan_because: i think its time we started giving back to society..after taking so much from it without any social conscience
lender.occupational_info: selling technology solutions for financial institutions

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: This is such a great , personal, way to help others around the world.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: It's AWESOME! It's like donating, but you get your money back!

lender.name: Erica
lender.occupational_info: I go to the Australian National University and study zoology. Mostly I'm interested in herpetology (reptiles and amphibians) and entomology (insects). I also work part time at the Australian Phenomics Facility cleaning cages and observing genetically modified mice.

lender.name: E.F.
lender.loan_because:
I wish the money was being lent at 0% interest to the people as I am lending it.
If all money were lent at 0% by all parties involved, then a true revolution would be realized and world-wide poverty would come to an end within this generation.
Removing the interest payment is removing the payment of tribute to the owners of the money monopoly that keeps the economic slavery in place.
lender.occupational_info: I teach what money is. To learn more visit SmartPeopleSmartMoney.com.

lender.name: Risto
lender.loan_because: If I help a few others, and each of them will later help a few others, and ... That's how it goes, I hope.
lender.occupational_info: Automation engineering teacher

lender.name: Trish
lender.loan_because: Although we're just middle-class pensioners by US standards, we're wealthy beyond belief to much of the rest of the world. And what better way to help people with less than we have than through loans to improve their livlihoods!

lender.name: Karen, Dundee, Scotland
lender.loan_because: This is a picture of me and my son; I became a single parent when he was 8 months old, and appreciate what it means to accept help and to be given chances.
lender.occupational_info: A challenge every day!

lender.name: Fred W.
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want to help end poverty in the world

lender.name: Us :)
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone can achieve something good if given a push in the right direction.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate that I have more than I need for a comfortable life. This seems a good way to share that good fortune.

lender.name: marilou
lender.loan_because: i loan because i want to have a business to become an operator of public utility vehicle.in our placed
lender.occupational_info: it is a manufacturing company

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because:
Others have helped me in the past, and I have the means to help others in turn.
Servi en Chile por dos anos como misionero para la Iglesia de Jesucristo de los Santos de los Ultimos Dias. Desde entonces he continuado trabajando con gente en necesidad, o por medio de la iglesia, o por medio de la red y sitios como kiva. Espero que puedo ayudar a otros como otros me han ayudado en el pasado.
lender.occupational_info:
I'm a soldier in the US Army, a bishop in my church, and an author. I also do real estate investing.
Soy soldado en el ejercito de los EEUU. Soy autor (aun que todavia no se he publicado).

lender.name: Subhasish
lender.loan_because: I belong to a middle class family. My father took some personal loans for urgent purposes in our family. I am still a student. i can't see my parents get abased by the bank representativs everyday. I want to do a small business to help them to a some extent.

lender.name: Andriana
lender.loan_because: It's a great program!!
lender.occupational_info: I help undocumented immigrants who are trauma survivors get papers and start a new life here in New York

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: To make a positive difference by helping those who are in need.
lender.occupational_info: Doing good things for others.

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving back and helping others who are attempting to help themselves. It is my way of following the example of Jesus Christ and honoring my West Indian heritage of helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with seniors in an attempt to help them maximize their finances and improve their lives by utilizing the equity in their homes and converting that equity into cash that can be used in multiple ways to improve the quality of their lives as they enter their sunset years.

lender.name: Camilo & Catherine
lender.loan_because: We want to share our blessings with others.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: How else can I embrace someone so far away? KIVA is a wonderful opportunity to show love.
lender.occupational_info: When someone is injured or seriously ill, I am part of a team to help them back to health.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I have travelled to developing countries several times, and seen how hard it is to improve your life when you start with nothing. I think Kiva is a fantastic way to make a tangible difference in someone's life, that will benefit them, and possibly further generations.
lender.occupational_info: I am training to be a Speech and Language Therapist. I will be helping people to speak, from older people who've had strokes, and can't remember their words, to children as young as 3 months who are having problems with their developing language

lender.name: Tristan
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity.

lender.name: Dave & Elise
lender.loan_because: We want to help people that want to both earn a decent living at home, and improve their family and community conditions.

lender.name: Jas_Chinita
lender.loan_because:
Given the right opportunity one can rise above the issues that suround them.
No one chose who, where, when and how we came into this world, but we can make a difference to help those in need, and those in need can make a difference when given the materials and making the right choices.
We can all make a difference, and make the right choices.
This is just the beginning.
I am also a contributor to Ryan's Well Foundation www.ryanswell.org. & Children's International.

lender.name: ENRICO
lender.loan_because: I love Africa, I love the idea of microcredit, and I really hope this lend can help

lender.name: lisby and kara
lender.loan_because: we've been helped in hard times and now we want to help. That 1 John thing... :)

lender.name: Team Illumina
lender.loan_because: We're sharing a performance bonus given at the end of big project.
lender.occupational_info: Genetic research and customized medicine.

lender.name: Harmony
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to grow their assets, invest in their future and raise the quality of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: The program I coordinate invests money in neighborhoods and brings people together to work on creating a common vision and developing improvement projects for their own neighborhood.

lender.name: Brad
lender.occupational_info:
I work at WolfPack Mobile Storage.
We deliver, you pack, we store.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I can, and I should.
lender.occupational_info: A fixer

lender.name: Jim Moulton
lender.loan_because: I believe in people, and people need to be given chances. I want to share some of the "chances" I have had...
lender.occupational_info: I provide professional development to educators, primarily K-12 around technology integration and project based learning.

lender.name: Madison and Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I want to help give people the opportunity to make their lives better.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a wonderful way for us to s-t-r-e-t-c-h our limited funds for donations to those less fortunate than us. What better way to help those who are helping themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired software engineer. My wife is an artist, architect, and instructor. We have two wonderful sons, ages 17 and 9. We will soon re-locate to Costa Rica where we will build eco-friendly housing and start a small bio-diesel generation plant.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Nancy & Jeff
lender.loan_because: WE CARE!

lender.name: Rilla
lender.loan_because: I can and I should.
lender.occupational_info: I research how we can use technology to change people's behaviour

lender.name: Rick and Tricia
lender.loan_because: We care and we can.

lender.name: Lou & Felicia
lender.loan_because: We want to help those in need and we hope that it brings us good karma.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I have the opportunity to help hard working people in developing countries lead productive and sustainable lives.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to economic betterment at the grassroots level
lender.occupational_info: Credit research analyst

lender.name: Craig
lender.occupational_info: Medical Device Research and Development.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: a little money can go such a long way

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am an officer in the US Navy.

lender.name: Cameron
lender.loan_because: I know not how else to stretch far an open hand.

lender.name: Manoj, Rosie & Angela
lender.loan_because: Every now & then we remind ourselves there will always be someone better off & worse of than us. We also realize life really is great when you put things in perspective. Ultimately we give to help those whose situations aren't so great. Perhaps one day it can become great.

lender.name: Tinh Kevin
lender.loan_because: to me, it is worth it to help even just one person if they can make a difference for many
lender.occupational_info: I come to the aid of people in need of medical help.

lender.name: Cool Cat
lender.loan_because: Pay it forward!!
lender.occupational_info: We have so much, so share some.

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: I was profoundly moved by what these people are doing for their families and communities and i want them to be able to continue.

lender.name: Patrick & Jenna
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed with a wonderful life. We want to help out.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a manager in a hotel. Jenna works as senior research manager.

lender.name: GreenPC
lender.loan_because:
I am fortunate to be an entrepreneur in a wealthy modern country which has given me many advantages that other people do not have around the world.
It is only fair that I give back to the glabal community in some way, preferably to someone who will get great value with my modest financial assistance.
lender.occupational_info: We recycle laptops to keep them out of landfills and at the same time help our buyers save money.

lender.name: Legere Family
lender.loan_because: I saw a show on tv and decided even though I'm one person making ends meet, there are other people that who need help too. What better way to make the world a better place than right here starting with one person. I'm glad that I can help someone take needed steps to make their life better and to provide for not only their families but their community. Great idea!!

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: I ve gone through some tough times after a recent separation and have recieved lots of help.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain golf courses and football pitches

lender.name: gsik
lender.loan_because: I like to enable people and help them achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur with a passion for filmmaking and photography.

lender.name: Marco Chan
lender.loan_because: tous les gestes comptent!
lender.occupational_info: On cherche tous sans cesse...mais chacun a un but différent.

lender.name: Sathish Kumar
lender.loan_because: i would like to setup education center
lender.occupational_info: i am going to teach computer education for the people who are financially poor

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I hope that a small contribution from me will have a positive impact to someone elses life.

lender.name: Denice
lender.loan_because: It's important to give what we can and reach out to other people. Together we can make a difference.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I feel happy

lender.name: Gustaaf Vocking
lender.loan_because: loaning is more than just giving.
lender.occupational_info: I help people realize what their true dreams are and then help them truly realize the dreams through training/coaching/consulting.

lender.name: curt
lender.loan_because: I can. We all should.
lender.occupational_info: I write articles -- on agriculture, recycling, autos and computers -- for magazines and newspapers worldwide.

lender.name: Lori Shook
lender.loan_because: i want to help women be successful in business. I appreciate women who have the initiative and strength to own and run a business on their own.
lender.occupational_info: as a coach i help people become more confident so they can reach their dreams. I also teach others how to do this.

lender.name: Massimo
lender.loan_because: if there's only a man dreaming, that remains just a dream. If there are many, then a new reality will come to life.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of circumventing the government in order to facilitate international development.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed and need to share it.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I have traveled the world and want to give back in ways I couldn't while I was there. And it is so much more effective than giving handouts on the street. "Teach a man to fish...", and "Trade, not Aid"!
lender.occupational_info: Helping develop difficult to access oil reserves in Canada's North to feed the world's appetite for energy.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I enjoy it.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I want people to be able to have the resources to realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Physics to high school students (16-18 years old) in the United States. Also, I buy houses, fix them, and rent them to people.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I've travelled all around the world and seeing those people who have so little yet work so hard inspires me. These are people who are trying to better their circumstances through hard work and they should have the right to help without simplifying it as being charity.

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: I believe we all should get chances to succeed in our dreams.
lender.occupational_info: HP

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Katelyn
lender.loan_because: my Uncle Ed generously gave me a Kiva gift certificate!
lender.occupational_info: A day filled with arts & crafts, outdoor play, singing, dancing and story time.

lender.name: Jodi Selander
lender.loan_because: I want to support women around the world who are working to provide for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a natural birth and women's advocate. I want to empower women to make positive choices about their health and wellness.

lender.name: El Camino
lender.loan_because: the world is getting bigger and bigger, and yet smaller and smaller. For people in developing countries who are just as entrepeneurial and just as savvy, but may not have access to the same resources to really get their business going, loaning gives them enough to change their own lives, the lives of their families, and hopefully, the lives of their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work with young people who want to give a year of their lives to work at non-profits directly serving the poor.

lender.name: Ami
lender.loan_because: I love these children and I want them and others to reach their maximum potential.

lender.name: Neil & Cindy
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is an expression of our Christian beliefs.
lender.occupational_info:
CPA-a financial advisor to business and individuals.
Social Worker- one who works for equality, justice and human dignity for all humankind.

lender.name: Gabriele
lender.loan_because: This is a moment in my life, where I would like to do something for someone else that I've never done before
lender.occupational_info: I work for an international firm that provide a wide offer of lubricating handling tools.

lender.name: Katrina & Pascal
lender.loan_because: I believe a little can make a lot of difference.
lender.occupational_info: Katrina is in the family business of Real Estate and Pascal is a freelance Illustrator, Animator and Art Director.

lender.name: Britt
lender.loan_because: I want to help people do work they love.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer who specializes in stories about individuals and organizations that are creating postive change.

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: I love the world.

lender.name: Allyson & Ed
lender.loan_because: We think banks contribute to the vast economic discrepancies in our world. We love to travel and are happy to have this opportunity to connect to people across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach writing at two local universities in San Francisco, and my husband is a photographer.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.occupational_info: Video Gaming

lender.name: MASSIMILIANO
lender.loan_because: I CAN

lender.name: Rebekah
lender.loan_because: My husband and I were both missionaries in Brazil before we got married, and we knew so many wonderful people there who worked so hard but due to a lack of resources were unable to get ahead. I loan because I am so grateful for their friendships and for the blessings I have in my own life.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: if by making loans that are to me relatively small, I can nonetheless make a positive difference in the lives of others, I'm delighted to do so.

lender.name: NW Girls
lender.loan_because: Our dad is teaching us the importance of giving to those in need. We look at this opportunity as a "hand up, not a hand out". It makes us feel good that we are helping those in need around the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are just kids growing up in the beautiful State of Washington in the Pacific Northwest of the United States.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: it's one of the best causes to invest money into!

lender.name: Anish Shah
lender.loan_because: We can make this world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am an owner of a website that connects people seeking legal representation with lawyers in their area.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Building relationships and community online using social media.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: It just makes sense to help others whenever possible. I have been helped by others and it's nice to pass it on.
lender.occupational_info: My work includes interior painting, house-sitting, pet-sitting, and house cleaning services.

lender.name: Aline
lender.loan_because: I want to.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Hillary
lender.loan_because: I want to take seriously the call of Jesus to provide for those who are widowed and/or in need. His love for them becomes my love for them, and I hope that, through these gifts, they would experience His love.
lender.occupational_info: I work with college students at the US Naval Academy, helping to create an environment where they can grow spiritually.

lender.name: Sharron
lender.loan_because: I watched a program on PBS about KIVA very late one night. I am very bouyed by the concept of being able to give a tangible message of support to someone with a vision. The message is: I have heard you and I believe in you.
lender.occupational_info: I work toward improvement in the lives of children and families in the Province where I live.

lender.name: Meghan
lender.loan_because: Last year I was the treaurer for a school club. We found we had some money left over at the end of the year and decided to put it towards a charitable cause. Kiva is a way to make that money reach more people.
lender.occupational_info: I make art for video games.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are working hard to make a better life for themselves and their family.

lender.name: Emilio Karam L.
lender.loan_because:
I like to give back and help other people who need it the most.
Sometimes just a bit of help makes a HUGE difference on someone's life... I like to be part of that and hopefully make someone's life a a better one, and making the world a better place for all of us.
I know sounds corny, but I do believe it.
lender.occupational_info:
I love my life.
I've been entrepreneurial of my life. I've had some downfalls and some very important successes, but nothing compared to what I'm currently doing, and the fun I'm having.
And I get to work where I want, with the people I want, when I want, and also helping a lot of people to do the same.
I believe success should be built upon the success of others and reaching out to helping those who need it.
I'm also a huge fan of personal development. In fact, I'm an NLP Advanced Master Practitionar and Trainer... now it's just for fun, and lots of it!
In 2009, I am launching several business adventures, with the goal of breaking the $1'000,000 mark in online sales.
DOING more, BEING more, making more MONEY, having more FUN, and GIVING BACK more !

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: Because I ought to. Because I can. Because it makes me feel better.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a storyteller (although it's become a little complex lately).

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: This is a perfect way to get money to those who need it. If everyone in the world could support themselves the world would be a much better place.
lender.occupational_info: I find stories in numbers and data and try to make sense of it all. I love what I do but it is a bit of conversation stopper :-)

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I have visited people in need and have realized that everyone can use a helping hand every once and a while.
lender.occupational_info: I am attending a university so that I can learn how to build structures once I graduate.

lender.name: John T
lender.loan_because: it works
lender.occupational_info: I work as a nurse in a hospital

lender.name: Hathai
lender.loan_because: All my life I've been blessed with the best of everything...and all of my life I have said that _someday_ I would give back something. Well, someday should be today. Even if it isn't much, it's a start.
lender.occupational_info: I assist my client companies in understanding and following the environmental laws of the United States and California.

lender.name: Tracy ann
lender.loan_because: I owe it to my kids to make the world as good a place as I can make it.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the federal government, helping to fund projects on public lands in Alaska.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I have traveled and lived all over the world and saw how important small entrepreneurs are to the local economy and how difficult it can be to get a loan to start or expand a bussiness. I admire their spirit and want to help them achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I believe in people doing the right thing and achieving their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I sell advertising to small businesses.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I can and I have a responsibility to.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in high school. I split my time doing school work and thinking about helping the world (such as through Kiva).

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: Microloans rule.
lender.occupational_info: I am in charge of a news website in Seattle

lender.name: gregory
lender.loan_because: I like those , who are welling to work hard achiving a dream - should have a chance to make it so.

lender.name: I CAN SAVE THE WORLD
lender.loan_because: I can save the world.
lender.occupational_info: Complicated, challenging, humbling, joyful, universal, global.

lender.name: lutalo bbosa
lender.loan_because: I want to help the poorer than me just as I also want assistance to flourish further
lender.occupational_info: Hard working artist and designer always exploring new fields

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. I hope to be a small part of making a positive difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: Joselito
lender.loan_because: I want to venture into a direct selling business which I have been involved before. Unfortunately, I have no available money to operate it.
lender.occupational_info: Its good. But here in our country we have to seek other alternative job to keep-up with our daily needs

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I enjoy travelling, and want to make sure some of my money benefits sustainable projects, run by indiviuals, in the coutires I visit

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: It feels like the best way to help people to succeed - they have the skills, we can help with the money
lender.occupational_info: Trying to get development organisations and businesses to work together more

lender.name: Penny
lender.loan_because: I've lived in Nigeria and Burkina Faso and met wonderful people there. Jesus said, "Give and it will be given to you." I have found this to be true, but I don't give to receive back. I give for the joy of seeing another person blessed.
lender.occupational_info: My mother is paralyzed and unable to walk. I take care of her and my father who are both over 70 years old. To earn a little extra money I substitute teach. When a teacher is unable to teach, I take her place in the classroom temporarily.

lender.name: Floris
lender.loan_because: I live
lender.occupational_info: IT

lender.name: Erwin
lender.loan_because: I like to see new entrepreneurs can have a start.
lender.occupational_info: Follow your dreams

lender.name: Adrien
lender.loan_because: I want to share the blessings God has given to me.
lender.occupational_info: Business consultant: helping others learn how to be more efficient.

lender.name: Ruthann
lender.loan_because: This is one way to redistribute the wealth of our world and allow those in poverty to have dignity as they work toward a better economic life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Cardiac Cath Lab in a hospital but my real work is organizing mission teams to Louisiana to work with the rebuilding of the Gulf Coast after Katrina's wrath.

lender.name: Bambi
lender.loan_because: If I give a person a fish she has a meal; if I give a person the ability to fish she has a future.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I am able to and I can't think of a better way to help! I get such a kick out of seeing people succeed with a little hand up. As long as I am able, I will continue to loan.
lender.occupational_info: I supervise the design and implementation of training for a company in Houston Texas.

lender.name: Lars
lender.loan_because: I get a kick out of helping people to help themselves.

lender.name: SAS
lender.loan_because: It is something that brings us together as a workgroup to help others enjoy their careers like we do.
lender.occupational_info: SAS is a group that helps our clients hire and promote great people into their organizations.

lender.name: Erika, Paige, and Jack
lender.loan_because: I love helping people in any way I can.
lender.occupational_info: In my spare time I volunteer for the local vegetarian group, and also started a small photography company that raises funds for animal shelters.

lender.name: S. KIMOUR
lender.loan_because: je veux renforcer mes activités et améliorer le bien être social dans les milieux ruraux de Kinshasa par l'utilisation d'électricité solaires (alimenter une petite radio à 2 piles et alumer une lampe, ... ) je suis dans le besoin de $ 1.500,00 usd. Ainsi vulgariser la cuisine solaire afin de lutter contre le déboissement dans nos mileux et sauver l'environnement (notre forêt en RDCongo). Ce crédit servira de fonds de commerce pour la vente des produits solaires (panneaux solaires , cuiseurs solaires etc... C'est grâce au revenu tiré de cette activité que je peux subvenir aux besoins de ma famille . je dispose une grande expérience dans ce domaine et je peux mener a bien mon activité Thank you a lot. I am Frenchman , sorry .
lender.occupational_info: Je suis un technicien électronicien je travaille avec des amis pour aider la population rurale à utilise l'électricité solaire à moins cher ,

lender.name: Gwendolyn
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner and know how much a little help from friends and strangers can make a huge difference in a life and a business.
lender.occupational_info: I make stained glass windows, lamps and artwork. I work with clients to design individual pieces for their homes.

lender.name: pixeleo
lender.loan_because: i wanted to create a b2b website portal in which i believe i could earn more and help the community in return.

lender.name: Tara and Seth
lender.loan_because: We care about the global community.
lender.occupational_info: Seth works at a local independent bookstore and Tara is a substitute teacher.

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: It is such a fun and easy way to make a little difference.

lender.name: Dina
lender.loan_because: God has truly blessed me. I love the way small businesses are the backbone of a community. These are the companies that reach out to the small causes and family issues that some big companies might miss because no attention is drawn to it. It is helping your neigbor, and I love it:)

lender.name: chantal
lender.loan_because: i am human

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Some would say...Why? I say...Why Not?
lender.occupational_info: I prepare tax returns, business records, and financial statements for my clients. They use the Information to manage their business. I also consult with them when they have questions. The overall objective is to help them manage their business efficiently and profitably.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: It's a simply easy way to help change someone's life. It's a good feeling knowing a small amount of money can have the power to change somone's life.

lender.name: eriq
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I make things happen.

lender.name: June
lender.loan_because: Many people have helped me and this is my chance to help others.

lender.name: Trinity
lender.loan_because: My mother has been so excited about her experience with Kiva, that she gave me a gift certificate to get me started. We love talking about the businesses people have, where they live, and their plans for growth. We cheer when people meet their goals.

lender.name: abiodun
lender.loan_because: I need money to start small scale business
lender.occupational_info: smallscale business

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to help hard working people be successful entrepreneurs. Everyone deserves a chance to live a better life by bettering themselves.

lender.name: jmvk
lender.loan_because: I can and therefore I should.

lender.name: Anne Marie
lender.loan_because: my loan will enable other women to help themselves. I am a business woman and this is a wonderful way to help other women.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an Accountant helping companies manage their money. Most of my day is spent in an office building working on the computer.

lender.name: Curtis
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I love the entreprenurial spirit and enjoy helping people attain their goals.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I want to share money that I believe can do worlds of good for others in need and also because I believe in being a smart investor of the future
lender.occupational_info: Well, I'm a hard working christian african american woman. The mother of two children and two grandchildren. I want to share myself financially and spiritually to others around the world who are in need as a part of my life fullfillment. I love being an active part of my community as well as in my church community. I live by the bible in hopes that all who believes in GOD can do great. "I want to help , so I'm here"

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because:
I was inspired by 2006 Nobel Peace Prize winner Muhammad Yunus of Bangladesh and the Grameen Bank.
"To leave the world a bit better, whether by a healthy child, a garden patch or a redeemed social condition; to know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived. This is to have succeeded." - Ralph Waldo Emerson

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to make a better life for their family and themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a business school student.

lender.name: Linda
lender.occupational_info: I help people make their written work easy to read and understand.

lender.name: Afzal Hossain
lender.loan_because: they can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Just do it!

lender.name: Buchanan Family
lender.occupation: Emerging Markets Trader; Real Estate Sales
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great opportunity to help enable people who are working hard to help themselves succeed and help lift them and their families out of poverty. We want to help enable growing and eventually self-sustaining businesses. There are many great ideas that not only help the borrowers but their communities as well.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: It instills the entrepreneur spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a group of people that develop computer software that provides a service to the legal industry.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: People should be able to pursue their dreams through self-employment.
lender.occupational_info: I help inspire people to lead lives that help others.

lender.name: Bill DAlessandro
lender.loan_because: It's a cool way to help people get on their feet. Plus it encourages entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I work on technology projects that help make the internet backbone function.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur myself, and while I have lots of options available to me - not everyone does. My vision is to make money as an entrepreneur to help my family, but always to take a percentage of what we make and use it to fund entrepreneurs around the world, so they can make a difference in their lives and of the people around them. Magnify and expand, and create the maximum benefit for the most people!
lender.occupational_info: I am a partner in a Canadian designer jewellery company that provides an amazing opportunity for people all around the world to work with our designer lines Feri and Feri Mosh online and make their dreams come true as an entrepreneur. I also run a real estate investment company that buys houses and rents them to good people, and I work with computers for a company that helps businesses get back taxes from the government!

lender.name: Francis Reyes
lender.loan_because: I think it's important to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a college student.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I know from personal experience how hard it can be to start a business. So it is now my responsibility to use what I have been given to help others.
lender.occupational_info:
After a 14 years' experience working for companies and organization with high-level strategic goals and brand positioning I now run the User Research and Strategy department of Axance, a French company specialized in user studies.
As a senior consultant, I also work with companies to fully comprehend end-users needs and abilities, and to create a global experience that enhances the services and products they provide.
In addition to his work, I regularly lecture on Internet strategy, leading master classes on e-commerce and e-communication.

lender.name: Jeff Benton
lender.loan_because:
Microlending is not only an opportunity to lend and/or give to individuals in need, it also offers an opportunity to invest in the local economy. Since small businesses often drive economic growth, these investments in the local economy have the potential to benefit an even wider group of people living in poverty.
"He who is kind to the poor lends to the Lord, and he will reward him for what he has done." Proverbs 19:17.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently working as a night watchman (security guard).

lender.name: Robert and Racquel
lender.loan_because: We have a strong belief in helping others to help themselves.

lender.name: SHAHBAZ ALI
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO IMPORT SOME PRODUCTS.IAM ALSO DOING A SMALL BUSNIES BUT NOW I WANT TO DEVOLP MY BUSNIES .
lender.occupational_info: I WANT A PARTNER WHO INVEST IN MY BUSNIES I WILL GIVE HIME A BETTER PROFIT ON MONTHLY BAS.

lender.name: Jermaine
lender.loan_because: I feel like I'm making a difference without having the multimillionaire budgets and big staff. I'm glad that my $50 and $25 can go that far.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retail manager (assistant). Not the best job in the world, but it pays the bills. Basically, I manage to get food into people's hands and keep the operation going. My real passion is finance...obviously! lol

lender.name: Grandchild Bella
lender.loan_because: paying back karma
lender.occupational_info: Design medical imaging equipment CT, MRI, Xray

lender.name: Eugene
lender.loan_because: When you help someone else it opens the door for you to be helped as well (Psalms 41:1-3, Acts 9:36, Proverbs 19:17, 22:9). We all need help some of the time. I hope to someday have a prosperous business of my own.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computer installations, configurations, troubleshooting related issues, software upgrades, and some basic lan administration.

lender.name: Francis Parker
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can. Through the process of raising money and lending money, our teachers hope we realize the enormous benefits of giving and of empowering others. We are 9 and 10 years old, but we have the ability to pull together and help people in other parts of the world in a meaningful way.
lender.occupational_info: We are students at an independent school in the United States. We are learning through our work at school what it takes to start a small business. It is hard work! In January we create small businesses at school. Hopefully, our businesses are profitable. If they are, the money we raise through these efforts will be used to lend to real-world entrepreneurs through Kiva.

lender.name: SARPONG
lender.loan_because: I want to expand the business.To buy more eggs and sell.
lender.occupational_info: A small business, which needs improvement.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.occupational_info: I help AFS high school exchange students from abroad find good host families, encourage American students to take advantage of the AFS exchange opportunity, and help them so they will have successful experiences.

lender.name: Jean-Remy
lender.loan_because: Change the world, just a little: "yes we can!" I can't no longer ignore that some other people are in need.
lender.occupational_info: Integrate some tricky methodologies within big companies. Allowing them within the same time to engineer and analyse their products. CAD/ computation integration (CATIA V5)

lender.name: Piers & Celine
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping others to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: We are two school children who have a bread business to raise money to help businesses through KIVA.

lender.name: Angela
lender.occupational_info: I help enterprising folks and small businesses spread their message.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe that a group of people can make a difference.

lender.name: Basil
lender.loan_because: I believe in the microformats concept and enjoy helping others.

lender.name: Don & Kitty
lender.loan_because: We are blessed and we want to share our good fortune with others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Pay it Forward !

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I like to help others.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to start my own "trust fund" - a fund of money that I loan in trust, with the loans helping the recipients and the interest helping the NGOs and the capital building until someday I have something worthy and appropriate to do with it.
lender.occupational_info: I teach formal logic and other skills to aspiring law students.

lender.name: LuAnn
lender.loan_because: The theme of our summer language program was Africa and the class I taught was Communication in Business. I made a commitment (along with my students) to make a contribution in some way to Africa. Giving a microloan through Kiva was the contribution I chose to make.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a Second Language

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I believe in responsible and dignified approaches to addressing poverty.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: there are so many people that need just a little help to go a long way. What better way to help others than this. Through the help of KIVA, one donation can help so many people. Thank you KIVA and Muhammad Yunus for making microfinance popular for all those in need of a just little help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Art, Art History and Computer Technology classes to Kindergarten through eighth grade. I work in a very small independent school with just 60 students. Our school is like one big family and that is what makes it so wonderful to teach here. I have been with this school for 14 years and hope to be with it for years to come.

lender.name: Eddy & Brandi
lender.loan_because: "We cannot all do great things, but we can do small things with great love." - Mother Teresa

lender.name: dona&ed
lender.occupation: Citizens of Earth,lovers of world music.
lender.loan_because: good planets are hard to find, and thanks for all the music!

lender.name: Flash
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of something bigger than me.
lender.occupational_info: I help people and hope it helps them help others. The mantra is Pay it Forward.

lender.name: bedroomradio
lender.loan_because: micro-credit is more effective than aid and donations, and because I was taught to share.
lender.occupational_info: Produce music, talk economics and write about what I see.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: We are only here for a finite period of time and by giving and providing opportunities to people less privileged we are able to create a positive effect that may last an infinite time! We only live forever in those that we help!
lender.occupational_info: I run an internet company providing email facilities to businesses.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: Hard-working entrepreneurs make life better for themselves and for everyone around them, and they deserve a little help.
